body:
@leezu can you provide code and version that worked on a previous version and fails now?

This failed on v0.1.12 for me:
```
>>> -torch.IntTensor(5)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/data/users/gchanan/pytorch8d/torch/tensor.py", line 327, in __neg__
    return self.neg()

```
